name: resimass
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wss(cima(cres(c0, c1), c2), cima(c0, c2)), wss(cres(c0, c1), c0))

body.origin:
|- wss(cima(cres(c0, c1), c2), cima(c0, c2))
-| wss(cres(c0, c1), c0)
-| wi(wss(cres(c0, c1), c0), wss(cima(cres(c0, c1), c2), cima(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cima(cres(c0, c1), c2), cima(c0, c2))
-| wss(cres(c0, c1), c0)
-| wi(wss(cres(c0, c1), c0), wss(cima(cres(c0, c1), c2), cima(c0, c2)))

|- wss(cima(cres(c0, c1), c2), cima(c0, c2))
-| wi(wss(cres(c0, c1), c0), wss(cima(cres(c0, c1), c2), cima(c0, c2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wss(cres(c0, c1), c0), wss(cima(cres(c0, c1), c2), cima(c0, c2)))

comment: The image of a restriction is a subset of the original image. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
